thread.title: Busta Rhymes Mocked Donald Trump AKA ‘President Agent Orange’ During A Tribe Called Quest’s Politically Charged Grammys Performace
thread.title_full: Busta Rhymes Mocked Donald Trump AKA ‘President Agent Orange’ During A Tribe Called Quest’s Politically Charged Grammys Performace

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Busta Rhymes Mocked Donald Trump AKA ‘President Agent Orange’ During A Tribe Called Quest’s Politically Charged Grammys Performace
text:
A Tribe Called Quest took a stand at tonight’s Grammys against President Donald Trump. It all started with Busta Rhymes joining ATCQ’s performance of their song “We the people”. The performance started with Busta calling out “President Agent Orange’ for “perpetuating all the evil throughout the United States” and unsuccessfully enforcing the Muslim ban. 
Tribe’s set ended with people of different nationalities taking the stage as Q-Tip yelled “Resist”.
